Positron

A Next-Generation Data Science IDE

A free, open-source IDE that combines the power of VS Code with specialized tools for data science. Write code, explore data, and publish reproducible work—all in one extensible environment.

Built on VS Code
Python & R Support
Open Source

Everything you need for data science

Positron combines the power of VS Code with specialized tools designed specifically for data scientists and analysts.

Built on VS Code

Leverage the power and extensibility of Visual Studio Code with specialized data science features.

Polyglot Support

Write code in Python, R, SQL, and more. Switch seamlessly between languages in a single project.

Data Explorer

Explore your data with an intuitive, spreadsheet-like interface. Filter, sort, and visualize with ease.

Interactive Console

Execute code interactively with rich output support. Perfect for exploratory data analysis.

Environment Management

Manage Python and R environments effortlessly. Switch between different versions and packages.

Reproducible Publishing

Create reports, dashboards, and applications with Quarto, Shiny, and Jupyter integration.

See it in action
